ORFEUS documentation repositoryÂ¶

ORFEUS (Observatories and Research Facilities for European Seismology) is a collaborative non-profit foundation that promotes seismology in the Euro-Mediterranean area through the collection, archival and distribution of digital seismic waveform data, metadata and derived products.

Our website is: http://www.orfeus-eu.org.

  • Usage Examples
    • I want to download raw waveform data (FDSN Dataselect)
    • I want station metadata & instrument specifics (FDSN Station)
    • I want to know what data is available (FDSNWS Availability)
    • I want to know what data center to download from (EIDA Routing)
    • I want waveform metadata & quality metrics (EIDA WFCatalog)
